During this season or time of year, we see and experience the goodness of GOD and others in a special way. Being thankful or grateful for the kindness, generosity and care of people is generally reciprocated. It would be wonderful to experience this year round: Let that be our goal as believers in CHRIST!

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   Psalms 31:19
-   Week 2
    -   Hebrews 6:5
-   Week 3
    -   Romans 15:14
-   Week 4
    -   Amos 5:14
